publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3423 Ms Margaret Curran: Race Equalityâ€”That the Parliament recognises the importance of tackling racism, prejudice and inequality as integral to promoting an inclusive, confident and prosperous Scotland that retains and attracts talent from different cultures and backgrounds and welcomes the anti-racism and race equality work being done by the Executive and other national and local bodies. Supported by: Nicol Stephen*, Hugh Henry*
